articles.description: States across the country are rolling back access to abortion, and the fate of Roe v. Wade is up in the air -- two factors that Democrats believe could elevate the issue of abortion rights this midterm cycle to a level not reached in recent memory.

articles.title: Remote island ramps up defenses as tensions rise between Japan and China
